snippet: A panel of experts said that the World Health Organization requires a radical change of culture to cope with future emergencies.
abstract: United Nations preliminary report finds that World Health Organization's response to 2014 Ebola outbreak was inadequate and recommends overhaul of WHO finances and new structure capable of better emergency response.
lead_paragraph: A panel of experts said that the World Health Organization requires a radical change of culture to cope with future emergencies.

headline.main: W.H.O. Needs Reforms in Wake of Ebola Crisis, Report Says
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Panel Recommends Overhaul at W.H.O.
